section-1-council_training_key3: Providing assistance to students to apply for internships and jobs
section-1-council_training_key4: Corresponding with companies for recruitment and internships
section-1-council_training_key5: Organising interview readiness sessions for students such as resume writing and mock interviews
section-1-council_training_key6: Coordinating all activities related to training and placement such as but not limited to inviting companies for interviews, arranging interviews, ensure that the students are behaving responsibly with the job offers and the companies such that companies have a favorable experience with NavGurukul
